================================
Business Requirement from Issues
================================
Introduction
============

This module is part of a set of modules 
(`Business Requirements <https://github.com/OCA/business-requirement/blob/8.0/README.md>`_) 
This module adds integration between project issues  and Business Requirement
model:

* Possibility to create a BR from a Project Issue 

Configuration
=============

Button to create the BR in the issue is available for project users.

Usage
=====

#. Link your project in the project issue.
#. Click on the Generate BR button.
#. Fill the fields in the wizard to create the BR. 

.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/222/8.0


Known issues / Roadmap
======================

* None yet

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/business-requirement/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
